nodes.text: Cynda Dreaming was a freighter that operated between the planet Gorse and its moon Cynda during the Age of the Empire. It was destroyed by the Imperial Star Destroyer Ultimatum in 11 BBY.

Cynda Dreaming was a freighter that operated during the Age of the Empire. In 11 BBY, it was in operation between the Inner Rim planet Gorse and its moon Cynda. It collided with the command bridge of the Imperial Star Destroyer Ultimatum after coming out of hyperspace above the planet Gorse. The ship recovered with serious damage; a nonhuman aboard estimated that repairs would take up to two months. Realizing that it would only take three weeks to replace the freighter, Count Denetrius Vidian ordered the destruction of the Cynda Dreaming. The Ultimatum's captain, Rae Sloane, concurred, and the Star Destroyer opened fire on the freighter, killing all those on board.
